page.title: 16FINZEAN SCHOOL:PROVISION.
page.content: The present school,{opened in 1964,}is a pleasant building set amid beautiful surroundings overlooking the Feugh valley. It has{2 classrooms}and a large, south-facing{General Purposes {room}used for dining and any activity requiring its spaciousness. It has a sealed and polished wooden floor while the classroom floors, initially vinyl are now carpeted. There are{indoor toilets,Headteacher's {/staffroom and a servery}from which 2 course meals, cooked at Kincardine O' Neil School and costing 55p each, are served in the GP room.{The server}is on duty from noon till 14.00. {An automatic oil-fired heating system of temperamental habits heats the building,monitored by{the school {cleaner}who is allowed 12 hrs weekly for her duties.
